content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court decided to dissolve a marriage and made various rulings regarding the division of property and financial obligations the applicant was awarded a portion of a plot of land and ordered to pay compensation to the defendant the defendant was also ordered to fulfill a credit obligation the court discussed the legal aspects of matrimonial property including personal property spousal liability and compensation rights both parties filed claims and counterclaims but only certain parts of their requests were granted the court allocated costs between the parties with the defendant being ordered to pay the applicants costs and the applicant being ordered to pay costs to the state budget
